channel.title: Evelus | Red - 317 Emulator
channel.description:
Download: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!wkdzwRzI!-cNGF47E0N2QWXkweDPtMDoXdLsl-BwJNgaEBLN2Bqo]link[/url] Client: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!0xtjlbIb!gVAknGn22Mu-vbbBYLLqzW8hlnFl6zUZgNU7FjScUtE]link[/url]
[u]Notes[/u]
- This server requires the client download above because all incoming traffic has deobfuscated opcodes. For more information on this topic check out: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653615.0.html]link[/url] - Released under the [url=http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT]MIT License[/url]
[code]
88888888ba 88 88 "8b 88 88 ,8P 88 88aaaaaa8P' ,adPPYba, ,adPPYb,88 88""""88' a8P_____88 a8" `Y88 88 `8b 8PP""""""" 8b 88 88 `8b "8b, ,aa "8a, ,d88 88 `8b `"Ybbd8"' `"8bbdP"Y8 by Sini
- Requirements
* Java 7 * MySQL
- Dependencies
* Guava 14.0.1 * JDBC Connector 5.1.29 * ActiveJDBC 1.4.8 * ActiveJDBC Instrumentation 1.4.8 * slf4j API 1.7.4
- Export the database
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `evelus_game` USE `evelus_game`;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `configs`; CREATE TABLE `configs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `idx` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `flags` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=89 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `equipment_definitions`; CREATE TABLE `equipment_definitions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `item_id` smallint(6) DEFAULT '-1', `slot` smallint(6) DEFAULT '-1', `flags` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
- Run the ActiveJDBC Instrumentation
Instructions on how check: http://javalite.io/instrumentation
Example:
@echo off java -cp %1 -DoutputDirectory=%2 org.javalite.instrumentation.Main
- Run the migrations
Execute 'us.evelus.red.db.Setup'
- Run the server
Execute 'us.evelus.GameServer'
And you are good to go :) [/code]
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/J2YLUm3.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9Q7KfkC.png?1?9147[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/boap0El.png?1?5772[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Credits] -Graham [/spoiler]

item.title: Evelus | Red - 317 Emulator
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Never finished chat, if you have half a brain it should take you a few seconds. Instrumentation with ActiveJDBC will be hard for you to setup but I can help out if you need it. NPC updating should also be pretty easy. I guess it could use a plugin system. I will have a future update release, but no release schedule for that as of yet (I barely added in a few updates relating to status effects).

Read full topic

item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Coordinates 3200 3200, its good for testing.

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:2, topic:541533”]Decided to release it? Are you going to keep it going in the development or are you going to move on to a different base/framework?

Anyway, I might use this thanks! :)[/quote]

I just don’t do much development right now. Maybe in the future.

item.title: Evelus | Red - 317 Emulator
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Download: link
Client: link

Notes

  • This server requires the client download above because all incoming traffic has deobfuscated opcodes. For more information on this topic check out: link
  • Released under the MIT License 

88888888ba                       88
88      "8b                      88
88      ,8P                      88
88aaaaaa8P'  ,adPPYba,   ,adPPYb,88
88""""88'   a8P_____88  a8"    `Y88
88    `8b   8PP"""""""  8b       88
88     `8b  "8b,   ,aa  "8a,   ,d88
88      `8b  `"Ybbd8"'   `"8bbdP"Y8
                                     by Sini

- Requirements

* Java 7
* MySQL

- Dependencies

* Guava 14.0.1
* JDBC Connector 5.1.29
* ActiveJDBC 1.4.8
* ActiveJDBC Instrumentation 1.4.8
* slf4j API 1.7.4

- Export the database

CREATE DATABASE  IF NOT EXISTS `evelus_game`
USE `evelus_game`;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `configs`;
CREATE TABLE `configs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `idx` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `flags` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=89 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `equipment_definitions`;
CREATE TABLE `equipment_definitions` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `item_id` smallint(6) DEFAULT '-1',
  `slot` smallint(6) DEFAULT '-1',
  `flags` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

- Run the ActiveJDBC Instrumentation

Instructions on how check:  http://javalite.io/instrumentation

Example:

@echo off
java -cp %1  -DoutputDirectory=%2  org.javalite.instrumentation.Main

- Run the migrations

Execute 'us.evelus.red.db.Setup'

- Run the server

Execute 'us.evelus.GameServer'

And you are good to go :)

[spoiler=Media]



[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Credits]
-Graham
[/spoiler]

Read full topic
